wikipedia_page.main: Giles Cooper is a British entertainment producer, concert promoter and marketer. He is managing director of Soho Media Group, based in the West End of London and CEO of Giles Cooper Entertainment t/a GCE Live. He is chairman of the Royal Variety Charity, and since 2010 has been one of the producers of its annual fund-raising event, the Royal Variety Performance.Cooper was made a fellow of the Royal Society of Arts in 2006, and received the Freedom of the City of London in 2014.

response: * Giles Cooper, entertainment producer, born in Amersham. Best known as Chairman of the Royal Variety Performance
* Giles Cooper, (1968–), entertainment producer & promoter. Best known as Chairman of the annual Royal Variety Performance
* Giles Cooper, entertainment producer and promoter, chairman of the annual Royal Variety Performance

Giles Cooper Entertainment (GCE Live) is a concert promoting company, producing tours and hundreds of shows for music, comedy and theatre throughout the UK. GCE Live is also well known for presenting and producing outdoor concerts in the grounds of English Heritage and other stately homes such as Kenwood House on London’s Hampstead Heath and Audley End House and Gardens in Saffron Walden, Essex

Giles Cooper Entertainment (GCE Live) was founded by Giles Cooper in 2016. The company's CEO, Giles Cooper, is Chairman of the Royal Variety Charity and an Executive Producer of the Royal Variety Performance. The company's founder, Giles Cooper was elected Chairman of the Royal Variety Charity by entertainment industry professionals in 2010  of which Her Majesty The Queen is sole Patron.
* Giles Cooper (playwright) (1918–1966), Anglo-Irish playwright and radio dramatist
* Giles Cooper (producer), British entertainment producer, concert promoter and marketer
